title: Ask an Australian about surfing [Greek version]
creator_credit: Alex Ezard and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf live-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised. Note: In Greek.
